message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me halfway?

Hi Bob, I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not quite ready to meet you halfway just yet. I'm willing to compromise, though! I can offer it to you for $105. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $98?

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer it to you for $115. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit above. Would you be willing to meet me at $105?

Hi Bob, I understand you're getting close to your budget, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer it to you for $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm still a bit above. Would you be willing to meet me at $110?
